## ATypedArrayTuple.set() method

Sets a value or an array of values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(_array: ArrayLike<number>, _offset: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_array | ArrayLike&lt;number&gt; | A typed or untyped array of values to set. |
|  \_offset | number | The index in the current array at which the values are to be written. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
